remarks: If a class' function values for certain arguments is not the empty set, the arguments are contained in the domain of the class, and the class restricted to the arguments is a function, analogous to ~ fvfundmfvn0 . (Contributed by AV, 27-Jan-2020.)
statement:
fvn0ssdmfun $p |- ( A. a e. D ( F ` a ) =/= (/) -> ( D C_ dom F /\ Fun ( F |` D ) ) ) $.
$d D a $.
$d D a $.
$d F a $.
$d F a $.
